word:
Chap. 23 - Love--a Divine, Eternal Principle


     Love, the Principle of Action.--When the heavenly principle of eternal love fills the heart, it will flow out to others, . . . because love is the principle of action, and modifies the character, governs the impulses, controls the passions, subdues enmity, and elevates and ennobles the affections.--4T 223 (1876).
